Blaze reported to the CR room only to find that Silver Scout hadn't returne=
d like she was told. "Of all the fragging luck." she said scanning the area=
. "The bitch is in stealth again." She thought for a moment about reporting=
 it but decided otherwise, if the leaders found out that she left the wolf =
roaming around unsupervised it would mean her head.

Elsewhere the tired, c=
onfused mutant known as Silver Scout found a quiet corner to curl up in. Sh=
e thought about going back but the red alert had caused her to decide to st=
ay safe in the stealth of her wolf mode. She was torn between hiding and tr=
ansforming. the longer she remained in wolf mode the more active the virus =
became.
